name: Income Tax
description: Every 24h, every citizen is based on their taxableIncome, which is the difference between their current wealth in Euro and their weath in Euro the last tick subtracting the tax amount of last tickthe taxLastTick is also saved. The citizen pays a tax of 10% of their taxable income below 1000€ and 35% of their taxable income above 1000€

Citizen.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen currently being processed for the timer event.
